type: Tutorial Step - Let's Take a Peek...

definition.text: Before we leave the trading system, let's take a quick look into one of these orders and see what may be of interest.

paragraphs.text: Expand Profit 0.6 and check the formula of the Order Rate node.
Let's focus on this misterious bit of the formula:

The formula is fetching the value of the Exit Target Rate, defined elsewhere. Let's not focus and what this target rate may be. Instead, let's take a look at the mechanism by which a Trading System may have access to information processed by the Trading Bot.
